page.title: 18STICKLEPATH,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: Mr Sims has lived in{Sticklepath}for 46 years.Since he lived here it has grown immensely.Then there were no housing estates and only a few houses and a couple of farms.He described {Sticklepath}as more than a suburb of Barnstaple because it has a small centre of its own with shops and a pub The traffic jams will still go on until the bypass is built.It will take out the heavy lorry traffic and the holiday makers. { *SCREEN PAGE AUTHORS* } Page 1:Mr Crocker;2:Jeremy,Lee,Clare, Disa;3:Naomi,Heather;4:Vanessa, Michelle; 5:Lynette,Catherine;6:Stuart 7:Stuart,Sonia,Alasdair;8:Anne,Annette 9:James,Simon;10:Julie,Emma;11:John, Andrew;12:Stuart,Shane;13:Heidi;14: Matthew, Peter;15:Heidi,Peter;16:Joy; 17:Joanne;18:Vanessa,Michelle; 19:Andrew,Ross;20:Annette.
